name: twining
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
growing or moving in a way that wraps around an object several times: a twining plant The twining vines clamber up trees and sprawl over the ground. See
twine
More examplesFewer examplesHe was still trying to scramble to his feet, but the twining roots held him firmly.She released herself from the twining arms about her. Our eyes were still glued to the twining snakes.
